name: Army Rescue 3D Van Enemy Blast
description:
Army Rescue 3D Van Enemy Blost:
You have played many rescue games but this Rescue Army Quick Ambulance game you are going to save the lives of your true army heroes who are fighting at the border to save the country. This military ambulance game teaches you how to drive and perform army rescue duties as a truck driver not seen in many rescue games. Here is a chance to save your army heroes who are fighting on the frontlines. The war is going on at the border and enemies have attacked the country suddenly and some soldiers have killed and some heroes are in bad condition and injured. So you are one of the best and skilled ambulance truck driver to save the injured soldiers from the war zone.
You have to use your ambulance to transport the injured troops to the military hospital in this emergency situation. So pick the soldiers from the war zone and transport them to variously given locations. Your target to drive a vehicle through hills and dangerous mountain paths you have to drop them to army hospital very carefully without any accident and any damage. Perform rescue operations and save the lives of injured soldiers.
There are multiple challenging levels and every level has an exciting and thrilling mission. Military saving Ambulance mission with smooth controls realistic 3D graphics, background sound effects and real war environment makes this rescue vehicle mission game highly attractive. If you think you are ready for non-stop rescue action then download Rescue Army Quick Ambulance now!
--Game Features
-Realistic 3d graphics
-Real army war environment
-Simple and smooth control
-Multiple challenging levels
-Interesting and thrilling challenges
